meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, the birds reinhabited their nests.
meanings.sent2: The old house was reinhabited by a new family.
meanings.sent3: The forest animals reinhabited the area, throwing a welcome-back party.
meanings.sent4: The town reinhabited with life as the new businesses opened up.
meanings.sent5: The garden reinhabited with colorful flowers, bringing joy to all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: The reinhabited house looked fresh and inviting.

meanings.sent3: The reinhabited room felt cozy and familiar.
meanings.sent4: The reinhabited neighborhood was full of friendly faces.
meanings.sent5: The reinhabited city streets were alive with laughter and music.

meanings.sent1: The wildlife documentary showed animals reinhabiting their natural habitats.

meanings.sent3: The garden reinhabiting process involved planting new seeds and nurturing the soil.
meanings.sent4: The town reinhabiting effort brought back the sense of community.
